title: XSS in $shop$.myshopify.com/admin/ via "Button Objects" in malicious app

profile.name: Shopify
profile.about: Shopify is a multi-channel commerce platform that helps people sell online, in-store, and everywhere in between.

activities.message: Thank you for your report! Our engineering team is investigating this issue.

Thanks again for your report! This issue has been resolved.

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place within two weeks, so we'll be in touch with you again soon.

Thanks for the report!

This was an XSS in our Embedded App SDK, which would potentially allow a malicious application to inject javascript in the admin area. It requires user interaction but the attack is plausible because the user only see the label of the button. We've opted for a bounty higher than our minimum in this case.
